content: > receive 20% off when you purchase 3 or > more patterns no coupon code needed **description** heritage sock is a top-down sock which features a simple lace pattern and small framing cables which do not require the use of a cable needle the pattern includes both written and charted instructions this sock includes standard heel flap directions and a kitchener stitch toe a beautiful yet durable sock that will showcase variegated and tonal yarns perfectly **finished sizes** adult s m l leg circumference - 7 8 9 **yarn** 1 skein woodland yarn co merino sock weight - 75/25 superwash merino/nylon or any fingering weight yarn of your choice **gauge** 32 stitches = 4 **needles** us 1 2 25mm or us 1 5 2 5mm whichever needed to obtain gauge **notions** 2 stitch markers tapestry needle #rachelnuttingknits *@rachelnuttingknits on instagram*
